header.title: Topic Preview - Upgrade 1.0.5 to 2.0.2
header.author-notes:
Styling / Behavior options: You can change the appearance and behavior of the jQuery Topic Preview theme for each style installed on your board. Search in your styles overall_footer.html file for .topicPreview and you will find available settings for: Themes, Width, Hover Delay Time and Position adjustment.
IMPORTANT: If you have installed any of the contrib/extras add-ons from previous versions of Topic Preview MOD, then you should uninstall those add-ons (following their instructions from THE OLD version of Topic Preview in reverse) and then it should be safe to re-install add-ons using the updated instructions included within this version's contrib/extras folder.

	<script type="text/javascript">

			jQuery("dt[title]").topicPreview({
				"dir"   : "{S_CONTENT_DIRECTION}", // do not change
				"theme" : "light", // use "light" or "dark" topic preview theme
				"delay" : 1500, // sets the delay before showing topic previews (in milliseconds)
				"width" : 360, // sets the width of topic previews (in pixels)
				"left"  : 35, // sets the position offset from the left (in pixels)
				"drift" : 15, // sets the amount of vertical animation, use negative values to change direction (in pixels)
				"noavatar" : "{ROOT_PATH}styles/topic_preview_assets/no_avatar.png"
			});
		});
	</script>
